   19: %%
   20: -module(timetrap_2_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,3}},
   32:      {require,multiply},
   33:      {require,scale}].
   34: 
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   37: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   38: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   39: %% Reason = term()
   40: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   46: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   53: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   54: %% GroupName = atom()
   55: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   56: %% Reason = term()
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   63: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   64: %% GroupName = atom()
   65: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   72: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   73: %% TestCase = atom()
   74: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   75: %% Reason = term()
   76: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   77: init_per_testcase(tc1, Config) ->
   78:     ct:timetrap({seconds,1}),
   79:     Config;
   80: 
   81: init_per_testcase(tc2, Config) ->
   82:     ct:timetrap(250),
   83:     Config;
   84: 
   85: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   90: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   91: %% TestCase = atom()
   92: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   99: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  100: %% GroupName = atom()
  101: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  102: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  103: %% TestCase = atom()
  104: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  105: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  106: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  107: %% N = integer() | forever
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: groups() ->
  110:     [].
  111: 
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  114: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  115: %% GroupName = atom()
  116: %% TestCase = atom()
  117: %% Reason = term()
  118: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  119: all() ->
  120:     [tc0,tc1,tc2,tc3].
  121: 
  122: tc0(_) ->
  123:     N = list_to_integer(ct:get_config(multiply)),
  124:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("TO after ~w sec", [3*N])),
  125:     ct:sleep({seconds,5}),
  126:     ok.
  127: 
  128: tc1(_) ->
  129:     N =list_to_integer( ct:get_config(multiply)),
  130:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("TO after ~w sec", [1*N])),
  131:     ct:sleep({seconds,5}),
  132:     ok.
  133: 
  134: tc2(_) ->
  135:     ct:timetrap(500),
  136:     N = list_to_integer(ct:get_config(multiply)),
  137:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("TO after ~w sec", [0.5*N])),
  138:     ct:sleep(2000),
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: tc3() ->
  142:     [{timetrap,{seconds,2}}].
  143: 
  144: tc3(_) ->
  145:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  146:     ct:timetrap(infinity),
  147:     N = list_to_integer(ct:get_config(multiply)),
  148:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("Sleeping for ~w sec...", [4*N])),
  149:     ct:sleep(4000),
  150:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  151:     Diff = erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, micro_seconds),
  152:     if ((Diff < (N*4000000)) or (Diff > (N*4500000))) ->
  153: 	    exit(not_expected);
  154:        true ->
  155: 	    ok
  156:     end.
